```{python}
#| label: fig-differential-pair
#| echo: false
#| fig-cap: "A differential pair."
import schemdraw as sd
import schemdraw.elements as elm
with sd.Drawing(canvas='svg') as d:
    d.config(unit=2)
    d.config(fontsize=16)
    
    M1 = elm.AnalogNFet(offset_gate=False).drop('source').theta(0).label('M1', ofst=-1.5).reverse()
    elm.Line().down().length(0.5)
    elm.Line().right().length(1).dot()
    d.push()
    Gds = elm.Resistor().down().label('gtail')
    elm.Ground()
    d.pop()
    elm.Line().right().length(1)
    elm.Line().up().length(0.5)
    M2 = elm.AnalogNFet(offset_gate=False).anchor('source').theta(0).label('M2')
    
    elm.Line().left().at(M1.gate).length(1).dot(open=True).label('Vin,p', 'left')
    elm.Line().right().at(M2.gate).length(1).dot(open=True).label('Vin,n', 'right')
    
    elm.Line().up().at(M1.drain).length(1).dot(open=True).label('Iout,p', 'right')
    elm.Line().up().at(M2.drain).length(1).dot(open=True).label('Iout,n', 'right')
```
